 2024-09672024-08-28IRCC
ActImmigration and Refugee Protection Act
PrecisReappointment of ROUBA ESSAM AL-SALEM of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective September 16, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Reappointment of ROUBA ESSAM AL-SALEM of Montréal, Quebec, as a full-time member of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Montréal Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective September 16, 2024.
